briefdescription.para: Saves all application data to the specified file path.

parameterdescription.para: The file path where the data will be saved.

simplesect.para: Returns true if the data is saved successfully.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown if the data cannot be collected or the file operation fails.

briefdescription.para: Loads all application data from the specified file path.

parameterdescription.para: The file path from which the data will be loaded.

simplesect.para: Returns true if the data is loaded successfully.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown if the file does not exist, data deserialization fails, or data cannot be updated in the system.

briefdescription.para: Registers a new client in the system.

parameterdescription.para: The client object to be registered.

simplesect.para: The unique ID of the newly registered client.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "106" if the client object is null. Throws "107" if the client already exists in the system. Throws "108" for any unexpected error during registration.

briefdescription.para: Deletes an existing client based on their unique ID.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the client to be removed.

simplesect.para: True if the client was successfully deleted.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "112" if the client does not exist. Throws "109" for any unexpected error during deletion.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether a client is registered in the system using their unique ID.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the client to check.

simplesect.para: True if the client is registered, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "109" for any unexpected error during the operation.

briefdescription.para: Updates the contact information of an existing client.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the client whose contact information needs updating.
The new contact number.

simplesect.para: True if the update was successful.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "111" if the contact number is invalid Throws "112" if the client does not exist. Throws "113" for any unexpected error during the update.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the details of a specific client using their unique ID.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the client to retrieve.

simplesect.para: A Client object containing the client’s details.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "112" if the client does not exist. Throws "114" for any unexpected error during retrieval.

briefdescription.para: Registers a new employee in the system.

parameterdescription.para: The employee object to be registered.

simplesect.para: The unique ID of the newly registered employee.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "405" if the employee object is null. Throws "407" if the employee already exists in the system. Throws "408" for any unexpected error during registration.

briefdescription.para: Deletes an existing employee based on their unique ID.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the employee to be removed.

simplesect.para: True if the employee was successfully deleted.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "412" if the employee does not exist. Throws "409" for any unexpected error during deletion.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether an employee is registered in the system using their unique ID.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the employee to check.

simplesect.para: True if the employee is registered, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "410" for any unexpected error during the operation.

briefdescription.para: Updates the role and hourly price of an existing employee.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the employee whose role and price need updating.
The new role of the employee.
The new hourly price for the employee.

simplesect.para: True if the update was successful.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "412" if the employee does not exist. Throws "411" if the role is empty. Throws "413" if the hourly price is less than or equal to zero. Throws "414" for any unexpected error during the update.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the details of a specific employee using their unique ID.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the employee to retrieve.

simplesect.para: An Employee object containing the employee’s details.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "412" if the employee does not exist. Throws "415" for any unexpected error during retrieval.

briefdescription.para: Registers a material by adding it to the catalog and inventory.

parameterdescription.para: The material to be registered.
The initial quantity of the material.

simplesect.para: The unique ID of the material in the inventory.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a material is registered in the system.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the material to check.

simplesect.para: True if the material is registered, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "612" for any unexpected error during the verification process.

briefdescription.para: Updates the stock quantity of a material in the inventory.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the material to update.
The new quantity to be set.

simplesect.para: True if the stock update was successful.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "613" if the quantity is less than zero. Throws "610" if the material does not exist in the inventory. Throws "614" for any unexpected error during the update process.

briefdescription.para: Updates the price of a material in the catalog.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the material to update.
The new price to be set.

simplesect.para: True if the price update was successful.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "615" if the price is less than zero. Throws "610" if the material does not exist in the catalog. Throws "616" for any unexpected error during the update process.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the details of a material from the catalog.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the material to retrieve.

simplesect.para: A Material object containing the material's details.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "616" for any unexpected error during the retrieval process.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the quantity details of a material in the inventory.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the material to retrieve.

simplesect.para: A MaterialQuantity object containing the material's inventory details.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "616" for any unexpected error during the retrieval process.

briefdescription.para: Registers a new project.

parameterdescription.para: The project to be registered.

simplesect.para: The unique ID of the registered project.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "815" if the project is null. Throws "820" if the project already exists. Throws "817" for any unexpected error during the registration process.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a project is registered in the system.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.

simplesect.para: True if the project is registered, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "818" for any unexpected error during the check process.

briefdescription.para: Updates the status of a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.
The new status of the project.

simplesect.para: True if the status update was successful.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "819" for any unexpected error during the update process.

briefdescription.para: Closes a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project to close.

simplesect.para: True if the project was successfully closed.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "819" for any unexpected error during the closing process.

briefdescription.para: Adds a client to a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.
The unique ID of the client to add.

simplesect.para: True if the client was successfully added to the project.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "820" if the project does not exist. Throws "821" if the client does not exist. Throws "822" for any unexpected error during the addition process.

briefdescription.para: Removes a client from a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.
The unique ID of the client to remove.

simplesect.para: True if the client was successfully removed from the project.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "820" if the project does not exist. Throws "821" if the client does not exist. Throws "823" for any unexpected error during the removal process.

briefdescription.para: Adds an employee to a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.
The unique ID of the employee to add.

simplesect.para: True if the employee was successfully added to the project.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "820" if the project does not exist. Throws "824" if the employee does not exist. Throws "825" for any unexpected error during the addition process.

briefdescription.para: Removes an employee from a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.
The unique ID of the employee to remove.

simplesect.para: True if the employee was successfully removed from the project.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "820" if the project does not exist. Throws "824" if the employee does not exist. Throws "826" for any unexpected error during the removal process.

briefdescription.para: Uses a specified quantity of a material for a project.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the project.
The unique ID of the material to use.
The quantity of the material to use.

simplesect.para: True if the material was successfully used.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "820" if the project does not exist. Throws "827" if the material does not exist. Throws "828" if the quantity is insufficient. Throws "829" for any unexpected error during the process.

briefdescription.para: Adds a material to the catalog.

parameterdescription.para: The material to be added.

simplesect.para: The unique ID of the material in the catalog.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "609" if the material is null. Throws "610" if the material already exists in the catalog. Throws "611" for any unexpected error during the addition process.

briefdescription.para: Adds a material to the inventory with a specified quantity.

parameterdescription.para: The unique ID of the material to be added.
The quantity of the material to be added.

simplesect.para: The unique ID of the material in the inventory.

parameterdescription.para: Throws "610" if the material already exists in the inventory. Throws "611" for any unexpected error during the addition process.

briefdescription.para: The destroyer of the Company class.

The Enterprise class manages operations related to customers employees, materials and projects.It handles tasks such as registration, update and removal, manages project states and resource usage.Ensures proper validation and exception handling for each action.
